mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_program_mngr (pcm_name, pcm_path, org_seq, insert_dt) SELECT #{debname}, #{path} , (select org_seq from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = #{pc_uuid}), now() WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM tbl_program_mngr WHERE pcm_name= #{debname} and org_seq= (select org_seq from tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = #{pc_uuid}))

INSERT INTO tbl_updt_policy_action_result ( debname, debver, state, path, gubun, pc_uuid, org_seq, insert_dt ) VALUES
( #{item.debname}, #{item.debver}, #{item.state}, #{item.path}, #{item.gubun}, #{item.pc_uuid}, (select org_seq from public.tbl_pc_mangr where pc_uuid = #{item.pc_uuid} ), now() )
